story.title: Find out which products are on sale

narrative.iWantTo: know which products are on sale

scenario.title: Find products on sale
scenario.step: Given a list of products : Whopper Meal Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium
When these products are discounted in the same order: 20%, 0%, 40%
Then I should be told about the products : Whopper Meal Medium, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium

scenario.title: Sort products on sale from the closest distance to the furthest
scenario.step: Given a list of products on sale : Whopper Meal Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium
When the distances between the product and the customer in the same order are : 0.4, 1.9, 0.8 in kilometers
Then I should be told about the products from the closest distance to the furthest : Whopper Meal Medium, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu

scenario.title: Sort products on sale with the same distance from the highest rate
scenario.step: Given a list of products on sale with the same distance : Whopper Meal Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu, Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium
When the rates of the products are : 4, 3.9, 4.5 in stars
Then I should be told about the products in order from the highest rating to the lowest : Paket McSpicy Smokey BBQ Medium, Whopper Meal Medium, Paket Geprek Bensu
